ingredients.ingredient: 1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie crumb crust

cookingTips: Heat chocolate and cream together using double boiler to prevent scorching and ensure smooth ganache
Cool ganache to room temperature before whipping to achieve proper texture and volume
Chill finished pie for at least 2 hours before serving for clean slices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the cook the technique of creating silky ganache and how proper cooling stages transform it into a light, whipped truffle filling.
